data.text:
@EU_Commission No thanks . 
THIS IS A GERMAN EUROPIAN UNION .
@EU_Commission Un' Europa per essere unita ha bisogno di una lingua comune, ragazzi sveglia, un bambino ci arriva prima.

@EU_Commission Non sono cittadino europeo! Cittadino Italiano. 
#italexit
@EU_Commission RECONQUISTA
@EU_Commission And... catalan, Where is? 😒
@EU_Commission The EU does not give my vote validity, or that of more than two million people.  Therefore, the EU does not deserve any credibility.  Sham and shame

@EU_Commission Where is your dignity saying that when my vote and more than 2M people's votes to @KRLS are lost? And what about the Catalans  imprisoned by Spain? Nothing to say about that? Then no freedom, no equality, no rule of law, no basic rights, ... that's a shame!!
@EU_Commission Parassiti siete parassiti.

@EU_Commission The MPs I voted for are held in prison before trial for doing what the majority voted them for to do. 
The MPs I voted for are not allowed into the European Parliament. (Equality? Democracy?)
@EU_Commission Saber un idioma es útil sólo si lo vas a usar en el día a día.

@EU_Commission @wherepond I have just posted a video of Israeli military violence against Palestinian women.  It was brutal and sickening to look at.  Yet, EU and others choose to remain silent against this inhuman treatment...
@EU_Commission They had to but I bet most of them would have preferred to learn Italian ;-)
@EU_Commission The Brits want to leave but the English won't leave.
@EU_Commission Vejam quan podem parlar en CATALÀ  i tenir els nostres representants votats x quasi 2milions de catalans
@EU_Commission So, after #Brexit we call it „Irish“ or „Maltese“ or „Scotish“ (after they rejoined)? To have a lingua franca of a non-member state doesn’t make sense, right?
@EU_Commission omegalul.
@EU_Commission Except if you are a catalan...

@EU_Commission No és cert! Els europarlamentaris Puigdemont, Comín i Junqueras no han pogut incorporar-se al seu escó. El meu vot l'heu ignorat. Ni justicia,ni DDHH,ni Igualtat,ni Democràcia... No heu complert cap dels vostres valors, heu prostituït els meus drets!
@EU_Commission #Spainispain
@EU_Commission Shame #Catalonia

@EU_Commission I am quatrilingual English, French, Spanish and Catalan. However only Catalan is my mother tongue. You are not respecting my right at that of nearly 10 M Europeans to communicate in their mother tongue! 

Oh, and remember #NoRepresentationNoTaxation!
@EU_Commission 9 milioni? I voti per la Lega Salvini?
@EU_Commission Sure? i've voted @KRLS & my vote is not there? Can u explain this? Thx
@EU_Commission BUT CATALONIA 😡
@EU_Commission Surely there are many more than just 24 languages spoken in the EU. there are more than that spoken just in the UK.
@EU_Commission The vote of about 2 milion catalans have been ignored. Fuck off EU commission
@EU_Commission Freedom? Rule of law? Democracy? No, SHAME!!! #Catalonia
@EU_Commission And catalan?
@EU_Commission My language is catalan.
@EU_Commission Paging @susie_dent ...

@EU_Commission Shame on @EU_Commission 
What about Catalan language... and Catalan MEP ?

@EU_Commission None of them are respected in #Catalonia
#jotambesocCDR
#independència
#CatalanRepublic

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Jacques Chirac m'a habillé en uniforme bleu. J'ai grandi et étudié dans cette structure. Condoléances à la famille et à tous les français pour le décès. Merci Jacques Chirac. On se voit toujours.

@EU_Commission You forgot the most important principle of the European Commission: Propaganda.

You're welcome!
@EU_Commission My language,  catalan,  joined probably my last EP vote for Carles Puigdemont: both sind away!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Junncker was devastated or drunken?
@EU_Commission What about Catalan, spoken in 3 of the member states?
@EU_Commission Where is Catalan language? It has got more speakers that the half of the official languages. Could EU Commission answer this question, please?
@EU_Commission نرحب بتلك القيم

@EU_Commission My only language is the CATALAN!

Fuck you @EU_Commission !
@EU_Commission I spoke catalan. A languaje who has more spokers than the danish,or de dutch........you discriminated me
@EU_Commission You discriminate my vote. I voted @KRLS
@EU_Commission Italexit
@EU_Commission Agian munduarentzat ez zara inor, baina niretzat mundua zara

@EU_Commission Values?  Ahahahahah 

2K votes stolen from the Catalans.
Political Prisoners . 
Refugees. 
Environmental . 
BCE extra limited functions 
 
.
.
.
@EU_Commission Rule of hipocresy
@EU_Commission Podeu anar a la merda
@EU_Commission LIARS!!! FEIXISTES;NAZIS, ASSASSINS !!!

@EU_Commission @SARGalileo Yes, but we would like to see our politics free as well and representing us in our Catalan Government and in the European Parliament as well. #FreeCatalonia @ourvoteseu #freecatalanpoliticalprisoners
@EU_Commission HIPÒCRITES!!! EUROPA DE MERDA. SHIT EUROPE !!! GENOCIDES CULTURALS COVARDS!!!
@EU_Commission My language is forbidden in the spanish Congress.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU There are POLITICAL PRISIONERS in EU!!!! #Shame #FreeThemAll #FreeCatalonia
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU There are POLITICAL PRISIONERS in EU 🎗️ #FreeThemAll #FreeCatalonia #democracy
@EU_Commission What about Catalán speakers? Could you add Catalan too? 🎗️
@EU_Commission Vaig a compartir: sou uns malparits, tanta protecció de les llengües i en teniu una de ben europea, però deixada de la la mà de Déu. Comisió Europea aneu a fer la ma.

@EU_Commission Hipòcrites
Cínics
Mentiders

#EDLangs #Catalonia #ThisIsTheRealEU

@EU_Commission @JosepBorrellF Equality.
Freedom.
Rule of law.
Democracy.
Human rights.
Human dignity.

European Union values AREN'T common to ALL EU countries in a society in which inclusion, tolerance, justice, solidarity and non-discrimination prevail. @KRLS @CatalansForYes
@EU_Commission A prendre pel sac, nois!

@EU_Commission Why would you mind catalan as a language spoken by 10 M citizens if you neglect protecting 2 millions Europeans from being represented in @Europarl_EN? #SpainIsaFascistState = #EUMeltdown
@EU_Commission @SARGalileo Shark Bait. I love it. I love it.
@EU_Commission #Basque language?
@EU_Commission So,  my language (Catalan) and my MPE are not recognise by the @EU_Commission  What a joke you are !

@EU_Commission Celebrate Language Diversity. I love that about Europe. Linguistics is a form of higher intelligence. Having to switch between language's is a high capacity brain function. GO EU. SMART LOCATION, SMART ECONOMY. @JunckerEU @ecb
@EU_Commission I els meus representants que?😡😡🎗
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Condolences.
@EU_Commission @jillfarrelly2 A very powerful symbol.
@EU_Commission What is wrong with you.  What makes you ignore an ancient  European language with its own literature?  What makes you ignore 10 million Catalan speakers?  Shame on you.
@EU_Commission A cagar a la via! Ho enteneu? Sinó que us ho expliqui el @JosepBorrellF
@EU_Commission Quina gràcia
@EU_Commission @pollytoynbee Ah bless.

@EU_Commission Jo parlo la llengua dels meus iaios, dels meus avis, dels meus pares i de la gent que estimo.
#JoparloCatalà ❤
@EU_Commission 👎👎👎
@EU_Commission La meva llengua és el català. No reconeixeu ni la meva llengua ni el meu vot.
@EU_Commission Sooo what about Catalan then? Planning to add it today to the parliament languages to avoid looking stupid with this tweet?

@EU_Commission Nope. Not really. Over 2 million Catalan votes have no Representatives in the EU, and EUparl is doing nothing. Worse than that, they r silent about repression in Catalonia, which means they SUPPORT repression in Catalonia. I wanted Catalonia to be part of EU... not any more. EFTA
@EU_Commission ANEU A TUMÀ PEL CUL.
@EU_Commission Aneu a la merda d’una vegada! Ara aneu, i ho fiqueu al traductor de Google, és català!

@EU_Commission Hungarian is one of the most difficult languages to learn: grammatical conjugations can make super long words like ‘to your health’ from ‘Egészségedre’ to ‘Megegészségesedésedre’ or  ‘you’ can be translated as te/téged/neked/tôled/hozzàd/ön/önt/önnek/önhöz/öntôl/

@EU_Commission Just here nothing to celebrate when you are ignoring minority languages bound to disappear in the near future because the states where they are spoken do their best to weaken them so eventually they will disappear. Disappointed again by your propaganda!
@EU_Commission En català si us plau!
@EU_Commission @SARGalileo ✌️
@EU_Commission I’ll share, thanks. My native language is Catalan and it is spoken by over 10 million Europeans. However,, it is not official because of 🇪🇸 and their EU club friends. Shame on EU.
@EU_Commission @SARGalileo We will be staying with you, EU! #StopBrexit

@EU_Commission What about CATALAN? We are 10 million people speaking CATALAN and you just say NO to include it as an european official language under pressure of the fascist spanish government even PSOE or PP on the Top.
@EU_Commission What about the catalan. Shame of Europe!
@EU_Commission What about CATALAN language spoken by 10.000.000 europeans?!
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Everyday people die. They go unnoticed. Because government does not care.

@EU_Commission I don't know, Rick!
I think is FAKE...!😉
According the UN in Spain there are Political Prisioners...🤦
They have requested 4 months ago their IMMEDIATE realease..!
They are still in Jail....!🤦
What have you done ABOUT IT???🤔🤔🤔
NOOOOTHING!
RICK, EU IT'S CLEARLY FAKE!
@EU_Commission Feliz Día.

@EU_Commission And Spain is violating all of them
Congratulations @EU_Commission You talk a lot but you protect the worst dictatorial state in EU
@EU_Commission Europa di merda
@EU_Commission @SARGalileo Is this what you use to find the illegal immigrants and stash them in Greece and Italy?
@EU_Commission La UE és una farsa

@EU_Commission CATALONIA

@EU_Commission Where is Catalan? Surely it is a European language or is it not?
